12.eng-name: The Book of The At-Tatbiq (Clasping One's Hands Together)

hadiths.text: It was narrated from Ibn 'Abbas that:When the Prophet (ﷺ) wanted to prostrate after bowing, he would say: "Allahumma, Rabbana wa lakal-hamd, mil'as-samawati wa mil'al-ardi wa mil'ama shi'ta min shai'in ba'd ( O Allah, our Lord, to You be the Praise, filling the heavens, filling the Earth, and filling whatever else You will)

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا يَقُولُ فِي قِيَامِهِ ذَلِكَ
chapter.eng-name: What is to be said when standing up (after bowing)
